name: Duty of Snipers Street City
description:
Duty of Snipers Street City is the city based game set in the urban landscape, rooftops and sidewalks of your city where terrorists have wreaked havoc and created chaos by making citizens their target. the 3D game where you get to play the assassin, killer and shooter to battle,kill and eliminate the terrorists and destroy the target given to you and ensuring no terrorist is able to kill or make target a simple citizen of your city.
Features:
-terrifically Easy controls
-A Hit game
-Ultra HD quality Graphics
-Easy to find out enemies
-EASY and INTUITIVE controls accuracy
-ADDICTING game-play (FPS)
-Limited combat time
